original_text: At the commandment of the Lord they rested in the tents, and at the commandment of the Lord they journeyed: they kept the charge of the Lord, at the commandment of the Lord by the hand of Moses.
korean_text: 곧 그들이 여호와의 명령을 따라 진을 치며 여호와의 명령을 따라 행진하고 또 모세를 통하여 이르신 여호와의 명령을 따라 여호와의 직임을 지켰더라

sentences.original_text: At the commandment of the Lord they rested in the tents
and at the commandment of the Lord they journeyed
they kept the charge of the Lord
at the commandment of the Lord by the hand of Moses
